name: Garlic Shrimp Pasta
description: Mediterranean-inspired pasta with succulent shrimp in garlic and olive oil sauce. Quick and elegant.

instructions.instruction: Cook spaghetti in salted boiling water until al dente.
Heat olive oil and butter in a large skillet over medium heat.
Add garlic slices, cook 1 minute until golden.
Add red pepper flakes, cook 30 seconds.
Add shrimp, cook 2 minutes per side.
instructions.tip: Shrimp should be pink but not overcooked.

instructions.instruction: Add drained pasta to the skillet.
Add 1/2 cup pasta water, toss until sauce coats pasta.
Garnish with parsley and lemon zest. Serve.

tips: Pat shrimp dry before cooking for better browning.
Pasta water starch makes the sauce creamy.
Add Parmesan cheese to enhance flavor.
Use fresh shrimp - thaw frozen ones completely.
storageInfo: Best served fresh. Refrigerate for 1 day maximum.
servingSuggestion: Serve with green salad and crusty bread.
variations: Add cherry tomatoes for more color.
Serve over arugula for a peppery bite.
